New Records: Charlie Blackmon's 227th home run tied Carlos Gonzalez for the fifth in franchise history
Key Match Events: Colorado Rockies come-from-behind 10-8 victory over the St. Louis Cardinals
Charlie Blackmon's two-run home run in the second inning was the 227th of his 14-year career
Pre-Game Insights: Charlie Blackmon announced earlier this week that this is his last season in the MLB
Post-Match Reflections: Blackmon said he wants to enjoy his last three games and remember as much as he can
Miscellaneous Highlights: Charlie Blackmon had three RBIs and three runs in the game
The Rockies face the Los Angeles Dodgers on Friday, Saturday and Sunday
